Text.Page:
Everyone's complaining about the supply problems, but you know what? Things are tough all over.

My gripe is that they're sending us nothing but rookies. Other than you, .

And I swear to the titans that the {@LinkCreature:9#100#tawny sabertooths} are getting fat on a diet of raw rookie. If you killed a few, the rookies might last long enough to become veterans like you and me.
Great work, <PCNAME>. We do that enough, the sabertooths will turn tail and flee when they see a soldier.
